word_mean: 羟脯氨酸：一种氨基酸，为γ-羟-α-吡咯烷-羧酸，由蛋白质特别是胶原经消化或水解而成

sentence.Network_en: It also contains high concentrations of proline and hydroxyproline.
sentence.Network_cn: 它还含有高浓度的脯氨酸和羟脯氨酸.

sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile, urine calcium and hydroxyproline concentrations were examined as well.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时测定尿中的钙和羟脯氨酸的含量.

sentence.Network_en: The derivative 4 - hydroxyproline is an important component of cell walls.
sentence.Network_cn: 脯氨酸的衍生物 4-OH 脯氨酸是细胞壁的重要组成成分.
